kinectName.descritpion: name of the kinect server, 'none' if no kinect

seuil_bien.descritpion: high threshold for the kinect feedback (useful if kinect exists)

seuil_nul.descritpion: low threshold for the kinect feedback (useful if kinect exists)

seuil_minable.descritpion: very low threshold for the kinect feedback (useful if kinect exists)

fullScreen.description: Eyes/face fullscreen mode : True/False (useful if screenOn=True)

internet.description: True if internet connection exists, False if no

repetitions.description: robot shows exercise while the user is moving or not (useful if kinect exists)
